game.name: Sherlock Holmes versus Jack the Ripper
game.shortDescription: Recognized as one of the best licenses in gaming and lauded by the press, Sherlock Holmes is back with an investigation that is sure to be the most horrifying of the series. The famous detective stands against the most dangerous serial killer England has ever known - Jack the Ripper.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Recognized as one of the best licenses in gaming and lauded by the press, Sherlock Holmes is back with an investigation that is sure to be the most horrifying of the series. The famous detective stands against the most dangerous serial killer England has ever known - Jack the Ripper.

reviewHighlights.text: Intriguing and well woven interpretation of the Jack the Ripper case. At times grave, but with respect and sensitivity where needed. At times funny in...
I RECOMMEND SHERLOCK HOLMES VERSUS JACK THE RIPPER !! AMAZING GAME !! INTERESTING STORY !! Adventure, Detective, Mystery, Historical, Investigation, S...
